meanings.definition: A person or device that adjusts or regulates something, such as a musical instrument or radio.
meanings.sent1: The tuners carefully adjusted the guitar strings before the concert.
meanings.sent2: The piano tuner came to tune the instrument for optimal sound.
meanings.sent3: The tuners made sure the radio was perfectly set to play the favorite song.
meanings.sent4: Her keen ears acted like tuners, fine-tuning every note to perfection.
meanings.sent5: The tuners' precise movements transformed the instrument's sound completely.

meanings.definition: A person who tunes or adjusts something, such as a piano or guitar.
meanings.sent1: The tuners at the music store were experts in adjusting guitars.
meanings.sent2: My friend is a talented piano tuner who can fix any key issue.
meanings.sent3: The tuners at the workshop joked about tuning up the old rusty bike.
meanings.sent4: Her father was the family tuner, always fixing the guitar strings with care.
meanings.sent5: The tuners' skilled hands transformed the piano into a melodious masterpiece.

meanings.definition: A device used to fine-tune or adjust the reception of radio or television signals.
meanings.sent1: The new tuners improved the TV signal quality significantly.
meanings.sent2: We need to adjust the tuners on the radio to get better reception.
meanings.sent3: The tuners on the TV seemed to have a mind of their own, changing channels randomly.
meanings.sent4: The tuners acted like magic wands, bringing clear signals to the screen.
meanings.sent5: With the new tuners, the radio stations came in crystal clear without any static.
